ambiguities.source_text: Bevens' priority is directly after Dimmadome.
The priority of the person who ordered the Rose Bar is directly after the person who ordered the Lemon Gel.

ambiguities.intent: Enforce that the final solution has exactly four rows with all titles, products, and priorities appearing exactly once across those four rows.

ambiguities.source_text: Only the customer with the highest priority has a title and last name that begin with the same letter.
